title: Reaction to Deshaun Watson discipline; Summer blockbusters; Texans QB Davis Mills; Live from Buccaneers camp
itunes:title: Reaction to Deshaun Watson discipline; Summer blockbusters; Texans QB Davis Mills; Live from Buccaneers camp
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins unpacking statements delivered following the disciplinary action against Deshaun Watson. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Mike Garofolo, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty explain which parts of the Deshaun Watson situation isn’t sitting well with them. Next, the GMFB panel welcomes a new segment called: “Summer Blockbusters” and then they’re joined by Houston Texans quarterback Davis Mills and he talks about the responsibility of being a starter, his preparation for year two and the veteran teammate he leans on. Later, they’re joined by Scott Pioli and he talks about the Steelers cap situation, Mike Tomlin, and the contract discussions between Lamar Jackson and the Baltimore Ravens. The podcast finishes up with a live report from Buccaneers camp.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
